page.title: 02Gazetteer Rayleigh
page.content: The area enjoys some degree of prosp- erity.Most housing is owner occupied; recent years have seen the growth of several new out of city centre super- stores in the locallity; most school leavers find employment or a placement on a YTS scheme. Five schools have produced the survey:Down Hall and Wy- burns County Primaries,Edward Francis and Grove County Juniors,and Sweyne Comprehensive.Each school was allocat- ed and surveyed a number of Km grids independently,doing counts and estim- ating land cover.These counts have all been integrated into a single set of results.As for the text,each school chose several topics to examine across the entire survey area.These are on the following pages,each school enter- ing their own data.An index of each schools surveys and their views on the Project appear on the final 2 pages.
